snippet.title: Drakantos | Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Drakantos is a free-to-play MMORPG under development with more than 20 playable heroes, competitive PvP modes, and hundreds of PvE missions! 

ᴡɪꜱʜʟɪꜱᴛ ɴᴏᴡ → https://store.steampowered.com/app/2454980?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=comingup&utm_medium=official-teaser

✓ ꜰᴏʟʟᴏᴡ ᴜꜱ ᴛᴏ ʟᴇᴀʀɴ ᴍᴏʀᴇ ᴀʙᴏᴜᴛ ᴛʜᴇ ɢᴀᴍᴇ:
Discord: https://discord.gg/drakantos
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PlayDrakantos
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/playdrakantos/

#pixelart #indiedev #mmorpg #gameplay #Drakantos
